title: The Crypt

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Crypt is the bar located in the north-west corner of Darkmeyer. It is run by the vampyre Despoina Callidra, who sells blood pints, a beverage made of alcohol-infused blood, at the price of 2 coins. It is the only bar where blood pints can be acquired.

content:
The Crypt
Released4 June 2020 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationDarkmeyer
OwnerDespoina Callidra
SpecialtyBlood pint
Location

The Crypt is the bar located in the north-west corner of Darkmeyer. It is run by the vampyre Despoina Callidra, who sells blood pints, a beverage made of alcohol-infused blood, at the price of 2 coins. It is the only bar where blood pints can be acquired.

Players will have to complete the Sins of the Father quest and be wearing a set of vyre noble clothing in order to purchase blood pints in the bar.
